mdRecord.dcterms:description: Quote from Spongebob Squarepants (interestingly, this quote appears in the show as graffiti on a dumpster, making this instance a sort of meta-graffiti; see this short clip https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qWO_hdURLU); with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: SpongeBob SquarePants (Fictitious character)
